original_text: You are still exalting yourself against my people and will not let them go.
korean_text: 네가 여전히 내 백성 앞에 교만하여 그들을 보내지 아니하느냐

sentences.original_text: You are still exalting yourself against my people
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 아직도 내 백성을 거스려 자신을 높이고 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: and will not let them go.
